General.Name: Xiamen R&T Plumbing Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen R&T Plumbing Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of bathroom products and accessories worldwide. The company's products include smart series, including tankless smart toilets, electrical bidet seats, non-electric bidet seats, and heated toilet seats; concealed cisterns, such as dual flush, pneumatic, and sensing actuators; and barrier-free products, including toilet lifts, smart bathroom systems, and safety handrails. It also offers induction products, such as touchless urinal and toilet flush controls, and induction faucets; wall-hung water tanks; U-shaped, V-shaped, square, O-shaped, and odd shaped toilet seats; toilet tank parts, including fill and flush valves; and accessories comprising dual and single push buttons, tank levers, and other accessories. In addition, the company provides barrier-free bathroom and inductive product solutions; and bathroom solutions comprising adjustable toilets and basins, and toilet aids, as well as mirror cabinets. Further, it is involved in investment business. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Realte Sanitary Ware Industry Co., Ltd. Xiamen R&T Plumbing Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Xiamen, China.
